body_html:
dmoham1476 <notifications@github.com>于2018年4月7日 周六上午2:28写道：
I want to use the latest tensorflow-gpu (1.7) and don't want to stick to 1.5. So is the solution to build tensorflow from source without AVX support enabled? I have an old Xeon E5420 but am using tensorflow-gpu — You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#17411 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AGeJnptN5yMdVaVdWTsIwcjOAJuJbUDQks5tl7PKgaJpZM4SbSGu> .
You can build from source from the git clone master. It should auto adjust to ur cpu. -- Regards, Jin
